resources.string: Simply express what do you feel today, and lets us paint.
Build a digital diary of your emotional journey with Painthings.
On a scale 1–5, rate your current\nemotional connection to love
On a scale 1–5, rate your current\nemotional connection to Sad
On a scale 1–5, rate your current\nemotional connection to Anger
On a scale 1–5, rate your current\nemotional connection to Happiness
On a scale 1–5, rate your current\nemotional connection to Disgust
On a scale 1–5, rate your currentvemotional connection to Optimism
